EmailTemplate.name: Webcast - GC Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: {{Lead.first name: default=}}, You're Virtualization's Finest, and We Want You
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=header> {{Lead.first name:default=}} Your Calling Has Arrived.
<https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/welcome?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=wcast_stencil_love&utm_content=gc_inv> <https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/welcome?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=wcast_stencil_love&utm_content=gc_inv>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}}, You're invited to join The Green Circle Community <https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/create-account.jspa?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=wcast_stencil_love&utm_content=gc_inv>, a free, online portal for VMTurbo believers to convene, converse, and contribute to the evolution of virtualization management.You are a virtual visionary, one of the best minds in IT, and we want your voice. In The Green Circle, you'll earn points for every action you take... Blogging, commenting, voting, and breathing. You can then use these points to get cool stuff like t-shirts and headphones! So what are you waiting for? Register <https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/create-account.jspa?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=wcast_stencil_love&utm_content=gc_inv>. Talk. Get points. Get Stuff. Because everyone needs more stuff, except for latency and poor application performance of course. Your IT control system, VMTurbo 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
Copyright © 2014 VMTurbo, Inc. All rights reserved. <http://www.facebook.com/vmturbo1> <http://www.twitter.com/VMTurbo> <http://www.linkedin.com/company/248491>
